item.title: Changelly Adds Lisk To Their Exchange Platform And Other Tools
item.description:
Changelly Adds Lisk To Their Exchange Platform And Other Tools

Lisk continues to raise a lot of attention in recent weeks. Changelly, a relatively new exchange platform. Adde support for LSK to its instant exchange service. Users of this platform will always get the best rates. Moreover, the company also integrated Lisk into its API and widgets, which are tailored towards usage by other enterprises.

item.title: 3D Printed Implants to Eliminate Surgical Procedures for Bone Fracture Repair
item.description:
3D Printed Implants to Eliminate Surgical Procedures for Bone Fracture Repair

A team of researchers at Evonik Industries has developed 3D printed implants to replace complex and painful medical procedures implemented during the treatment of bone fracture. The German chemical company successfully created the implants when investigating into biodegradable composite materials as a substitute for metal implants.

item.title: Statistics Show Tesla Autopilot Is Still Safer Than Human Drivers
item.description:
Statistics Show Tesla Autopilot Is Still Safer Than Human Drivers

On May 7, a Tesla driver died in a fatal car crash while on autopilot mode. Almost two months later, Tesla published an in-depth analysis into the traffic accident and why it occurred.

item.title: Do You Make These 4 Mistakes When Explaining Cryptocurrency?
item.description:
Do You Make These 4 Mistakes When Explaining Cryptocurrency?

Have you ever found yourself explaining cryptocurrency to someone who knows little or nothing about it? When you know a lot about a topic, it can be difficult to describe it to those with much less base knowledge than yourself.

item.title: Bitcoin Blockchain Proof-of-concept: Storj and Counterparty Partner to Add Support for Payment Channels
item.description:
Bitcoin Blockchain Proof-of-concept: Storj and Counterparty Partner to Add Support for Payment Channels

Counterparty, the technology for decentralized financial tools on the Bitcoin blockchain, and Storj, the first decentralized, end-to-end encrypted cloud storage that utilizes blockchain technology, have teamed up and combined resources to develop payment channel technology for use on the Counterparty network.

item.title: Cloud Storage Provider Seafile Chooses Bitcoin, Ditches Paypal
item.description:
Cloud Storage Provider Seafile Chooses Bitcoin, Ditches Paypal

Seafile has announced that they will ditch Paypal payments and instead turn to bitcoin. This is an interesting decision with an even more interesting rationale and implication. In 2013, Seafile emerged as a business-oriented cloud-based storage solution, with a different approach. They provided their customized storage solutions within a company's previously existing private cloud.

item.title: New OCC Report Blasts Bitcoin For Role In Cyber Threats
item.description:
New OCC Report Blasts Bitcoin For Role In Cyber Threats

The point that interests us the most is how the OCC mentions the extortion demands to be paid in virtual currency. Ransomware has been a severe plague for the financial world, albeit other sectors are affected as well The OCC has issued a new report discussion the semiannual risk perspective.

item.title: Meet LenderBot: Stratumn & Deloitte's Blockchain Insurance Bot
item.description:
Meet LenderBot: Stratumn & Deloitte's Blockchain Insurance Bot

Paris-based blockchain application firm Also read: 4 Ways to Buy Weed with Bitcoin, Legally in collaboration with Deloitte and has recently unveiled its micro-insurance proof of concept: LenderBot. The LenderBot project enables custom insurance through social media in order to insure lent items between individuals.
